title: PODCAST: Chicken wars over sausage; EPA creating green-jobs
contentencoded: More on the current landscape of the food market, including the war between Pilgrim's Pride and Tyson Foods to purchase Hillshire Brands. Also, a look at just how many green-energy jobs might be created by new EPA regulations on carbon emissions. Plus, there's a concerted effort going on in the UK to train young people to make clothes in the hopes of increasing home-grown products.
teaser: The war for Jimmy Dean's, the creation of green-jobs, and the effort to make more home-grown products in the UK
